EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Optimize TRAX Testing with Tosca - EMEA - 2014.11.11.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Optimize TRAX Testing with Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Less Cost, Less Effort and Faster Time to Market
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
One of the most important steps in implementing and maintaining your TRAX Maintenance and Engineering ERP solution is ensuring the application does what it was designed to do. This involves testing the application, which can be a long and costly process. TRAX and Tricentis are partnering together to ensure you optimize your QA/Test environment to save money and go into production more quickly.
In this Webinar, TRAX and Tricentis will show you how to harness the power of TRAX. Specifically, we will discuss how you can:
- Leverage TRAX’s vast library of test cases based on the Tricentis Tosca Testsuite - Identify, manage and optimize the level of quality risk in your TRAX environment - Determine how and why to automate your test cases
Theresa Lanowitz, voke founder and analyst says: "There's very little tolerance for an application that does not work from a functional perspective as well as from a performance perspective." Best regards, The TRAX and Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-optimize-trax-testing-with-tosca-2014-11-11.html?utm_medium=par&utm_source=trax>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-optimize-trax-testing-with-tosca-2014-11-11.html?utm_medium=par&utm_source=trax> Tue Nov 11th, 2014 3:00 pm – 4:00 pm CET
OR
Thu Nov 13th, 2014 11:00 am – 12:00 pm PST 2:00 pm – 3:00 pm EST
Anthony Frucci Software Quality Assurance Specialist TRAX
Matthias Rapp Director Delivery Tricentis
